contents.content_title: At the height of modern luxury
contents.description:
Soar above the city at Discovery Primea Makati, a 68-storey luxury hotel in Metro Manila’s iconic Central Business District. A member of Preferred Hotels & Resorts LVX Collection, the brand new property is part of a distinctive portfolio of worldly and illustrious hotels offering highly personalized service. Discerning travelers on a quick sojourn or an extended stay will delight in state-of-the-art amenities such as High Speed Internet Access, a Nespresso machine, Internet Protocol Television, and PressReader.

 

The 141-room deluxe hotel is home to the swanky Gilarmi Lounge and the acclaimed Restaurant Tapenade, an all-day Mediterranean restaurant with a bespoke Tapenade Salad Room. The hotel features a 20-meter heated infinity pool, the Terazi Spa, unique for its authentic Turkish bath, and the state-of-the-art 37 Degrees Gym with TechnoGym facilities.

attributes.value:

The 141-room deluxe hotel is home to the swanky Gilarmi Lounge and the acclaimed Restaurant Tapenade, an all-day Mediterranean restaurant with a bespoke Tapenade Salad Room. contents.description:
Situated in the Ortigas Center Business District, Discovery Suites Manila is a 220-key property that offers the convenience of a serviced residence that is balanced with the perks of modern hotel living. Ideal for extended stays, leisure and business travelers alike can delight in modern amenities and spacious suites, including living and dining areas, and a fully-furnished kitchen. 

 

The hotel features two dining outlets that will satisfy culinary cravings, including the flagship steak restaurant 22 Prime, and Restaurant 5 for comfort food selections. 

 

Experience relaxation at its peak, whether it's for a swim at our indoor pool or an energizing workout session at the Balance Lifestyle Fitness Club. For intimate gatherings, a variety of our function rooms are available to host your event.

attributes.value: Experience comfort at Discovery Suites where the convenience of a serviced residence is balanced with the perks of modern hotel living. Our well-appointed One Bedroom Suites have living and dining areas and a fully-furnished kitchen, ideal for extended stays. Discovery Suites is a proud member of Preferred Hotels & Resorts Connect Collection, featuring smart and welcoming hotels located in interesting neighborhoods, ideal for work and play. The 220-key property offers High Speed Internet Access for unlimited devices and PressReader, which gives guests digital access to newspapers and magazines worldwide. More than staying connected, the hotel offers an indoor pool and a well-equipped gym with a jacuzzi and sauna. Dining options include 24-hour room service, its flagship steak restaurant 22 Prime and Restaurant 5 for Pan-Asian cuisine.

contents.description:
Experience the finest in island hospitality in the multi-awarded Discovery Shores Boracay, now known as Discovery Boracay. A member of Preferred Hotels & Resorts’ vibrant Lifestyle Collection, the 99-room luxury resort is consistently listed in Travel + Leisure's World's Best Hotel and was recently recognized by the World Travel Awards as the Philippines' Leading Beach Resort in 2023. 

 

More than the white, velveteen sand that Boracay is famous for, beach lovers will find pleasure in the ultimate pampering and genuine service.

 

Featured dining establishments include the likes of all-day dining Sands Restaurant and the best Italian restaurant in Boracay, Forno Osteria. Wellness service options include the highly acclaimed Terra Wellness Spa, a swimming pool, a recreation room, a gym, and a dedicated kiddie lounge for young travelers. 

 

Discovery Boracay's versatile spaces are ready to host meetings and intimate events. Destination weddings and celebrations are made more magical with an all-natural view featuring the best of Boracay Island.

Nestled in the untouched Dimakya Island, Discovery Coron, formerly known as Club Paradise Palawan, is your pristine playground in paradise with its abundance of flora and fauna, pristine beaches, and cerulean waters. Widely recognized by global organizations such as Green Destinations for its promising sustainable stories, the award-winning nature resort is in proximity to world-class reef and wreck dive sites. Dotted along the protected UNESCO Biosphere Reserve, its unrivaled marine life includes the gentle dugong and friendly sea turtles, making it a favorite escapade among families, friends, and divers.

 

The 19-hectare exclusive island resort features 62 rooms and villas, boasting scenic nature views of both the sea and the sky. Indulge in the best of island dining at the enticing all-day dining Firefish Restaurant, and then afterward, have a refreshing cocktail or two at the Dugong Bar. Have a soothing treatment session at the indulgent Glow Spa. For more active recreational options, exciting day trip options include the Coron Island Tour, Calauit Safari, Bottom Fishing, and Island Hopping. 

 

The radiant beauty of the island makes it an ideal location for a variety of social gatherings, such as for intimate destination weddings.

attributes.value: A colorful island all to your own

Enjoy front row seats to the Philippines’ final frontier. Nestled in the untouched Dimakya Island, Club Paradise in Coron is your pristine playground in paradise with its abundance of flora and fauna, and its proximity to world-class reef and wreck dive sites. Dotted along the protected UNESCO Biosphere Reserve, its unrivalled marine life includes the gentle dugong and friendly sea turtles, making it a favorite escapade among families, friends and divers.

The 19-hectare exclusive island resort features 55 rooms and cottages with scenic views of nature, as well as the Glow Spa, Firefish Restaurant, and three bars. The radiant beauty of the island makes it a choice location for intimate destination weddings. Exciting day trip options include the Coron Island Tour, Calauit Safari, Bottom Fishing and Island Hopping.

contents.description:
Signature Collection is a portfolio of city and resort properties each with their own style, voice and personality. Each property is as unique as its destination, and it veers away from cookie-cutter approach in hospitality promising authentic regional experiences to its discerning guests. 

 

Signature Collection properties are carefully curated and thoughtfully designed to offer Discovery Hospitality’s signature brand of service to complement its unique character and brand DNA.

 

The Signature Collection celebrates the craftsmanship, artistry, identity, and stories of its brands while ensuring the culture of care and world-class hospitality Discovery is known for.

attributes.value: Kip&Kin is not your typical hotel or hostel – nor do we try to be. At Kip&Kin, we want you to fit right in; to feel at home; to belong – no fronts, no fuss, no pretense. Kip&Kin is an experience of dynamic connections, changing and adapting to whatever you need us to be: a relaxed getaway or fun adventure, a ’workation’ or a work detox, ‘me time’ or a social mixer, a family outing or barkada trip. But most importantly, Kip&Kin doesn’t want life to get in the way of your travel desires. So we craft experiences with youthful finesse – enhancing the spirit of exploration with the style and substance that you deserve. Kickin’ soon. El Nido. San Vicente. Siargao.

contents.description: Offering the most magnificent views of the Davao Gulf and the best front row seats to nature’s spectacles, Discovery Samal is 30 minutes away from the Francisco Bangoy International Airport, Davao City. This grand haven is brilliantly designed by Architect Ed Ledesma of ELL, and embellished by interior designer Manny Samson of Emesaé Design Corp., bringing the sprawling enclave of carefully curated meeting, dining, relaxation, and entertainment options in the country’s premiere Resort City.

attributes.value:
Offering the most magnificent views of the Davao Gulf and the best front row seats to nature’s spectacles, Discovery Samal is 30 minutes away from the Francisco Bangoy International Airport, Davao City. This grand haven is brilliantly designed by Architect Ed Ledesma of ELL, and embellished by interior designer Manny Samson of Emesaé Design Corp., bringing the sprawling enclave of carefully curated meeting, dining, relaxation, and entertainment options in the country’s premiere Resort City.

Discovery Samal is set to open in 202

contents.description:
The first property under Signature Collection, Manami Resort is the first and only luxury resort in Sipalay City.

 

Perched in a best-kept-secret nature oasis of Negros Occidental, this exclusive 5-star resort in Sipalay is a stunning jewel offering an up-close-and-personal nature experience, well-appointed accommodations and facilities that are built with authenticity and attention to every detail, Discovery Hospitality’s brand of Service That’s All Heart that anticipates every traveler’s preference.

attributes.value:
